Generation III.Ruby: Manectric is constantly discharging electricity from its mane. The sparks sometimes ignite forest fires. When it enters a battle, this Pok é mon creates thunderclouds.
Generation III.Sapphire: Manectric discharges strong electricity from its mane. The mane is used for collecting electricity in the atmosphere. This Pok é mon creates thunderclouds above its head.
Generation III.Emerald: Because lightning falls in their vicinities, Manectric were thought to have been born from lightning. In battle, they create thunderclouds.
Generation III.FireRed: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.

Generation IV.Diamond: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
Generation IV.Pearl: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
Generation IV.Platinum: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
Generation IV.HeartGold: Its nest can be found where a thunderbolt hits. It is discharging electricity from its mane.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Its nest can be found where a thunderbolt hits. It is discharging electricity from its mane.

Generation V.Black: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
Generation V.White: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
Generation V.Black 2: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
Generation V.White 2: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.

Generation VI.X: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
Generation VI.Y: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Manectric is constantly discharging electricity from its mane. The sparks sometimes ignite forest fires. When it enters a battle, this Pokémon creates thunderclouds.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Manectric discharges strong electricity from its mane. The mane is used for collecting electricity in the atmosphere. This Pokémon creates thunderclouds above its head.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Mega Evolution fills its body with a tremendous amount of electricity, but it's too much for Manectric to fully control.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Too much electricity has built up in its body, irritating Manectric. Its explosive speed is equal to that of a lightning bolt.

Generation VIII.Sword: It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.
Generation VIII.Shield: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It discharges electricity from its mane. The Pokémon creates a thundercloud overhead from which to drop lightning bolts.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It discharges electricity from its mane. The Pokémon creates a thundercloud overhead from which to drop lightning bolts.

Generation IV.HeartGold: Safari Zone (Plains with 15 Plains points; tall grass in Rocky Beach with 10 Forest points; Wasteland with 3 Plains points)
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Safari Zone (Plains with 15 Plains points; tall grass in Rocky Beach with 10 Forest points; Wasteland with 3 Plains points)
